title: Author Plumbs The Human Psyche Through 'Animal Madness'
teaser: Laurel Braitman's new book was born out of a near-tragedy: her frantic dog almost leaped to its death from a third-story window. She talks to NPR's Don Gonyea about mental illness and Animal Madness.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
